scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:bundle && pnpm run clean:node_modules
scripts.build: pnpm run clean:bundle && pnpm run build:all
scripts.build:firefox: pnpm run clean:bundle && cross-env __FIREFOX__=true pnpm run build:all
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/dev-utils && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/hmr && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/ui && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/schema-utils && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/i18n && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/shared && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/storage && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/tailwind-config && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/vite-config && pnpm run build --filter @nanobrowser/zipper && pnpm run build --filter chrome-extension && pnpm run build --filter pages/content && pnpm run build --filter pages/options && pnpm run build --filter pages/side-panel
scripts.zip: pnpm run build:all && pnpm run zip --filter @nanobrowser/zipper
scripts.zip:firefox: pnpm run build:firefox && cross-env __FIREFOX__=true pnpm run zip --filter @nanobrowser/zipper
scripts.e2e: pnpm run build:all && pnpm run zip && pnpm test
scripts.e2e:firefox: pnpm run build:firefox && pnpm run zip:firefox && pnpm test
